descriptionHtml:
This is a Mod that adds 8 powerful Rings hidden in many strongboxes that are hidden is plain sight.
Here are the "General" Location of the boxes (Hidden in that area)
- Companions Box in Jorrvasker Living Quarters
- Dovahkiin Box  in High Hrothgar
- Mage Box in Arch Mage Quarters
- Warrior Box in Palace Of [s]Kings[/s] Ulfric
- Crafting Box at The Skyforge
- Berserker Box in Sleeping Giant Inn
- Thief Box in The Ragged Flagon (P.S I think i misspelled Thief in the mod)
- Archery Box In Faendal's House
author: Veridigo
